page.homeTitle: Dashboards, checklists, and tools for FFXIV

home.intro: XIV ToDo provides useful dashboards, tailored checklists, and tools for Final Fantasy XIV. Whether you are a new player to the game or more experienced, there is something for everyone! In its current form, it offers customizable daily and weekly checklists as well as automated completion trackers of encounters and questlines, with much more to come.

encountersQuestlines.title: Encounters & questlines
encountersQuestlines.description: Complete listing of all encounters, main and side story questlines available in the game.

contentCompletion.title: Content completion
contentCompletion.description: Add your character to quickly visualize which content you've cleared and which ones are still pending.

dailiesWeeklies.title: Dailies & weeklies
dailiesWeeklies.description: Comprehensive list of daily and weekly objectives which can be ticked off and get automatically cleared on reset.

altFriendly.title: Alt-friendly
altFriendly.description: Support for adding as many alt characters as you need, with all features being kept character-specific.

spoilerFree.title: Spoiler-free
spoilerFree.description: Main story content is blurred by default until they are cleared to avoid accidental spoilers.

customizable.title: Customizable
customizable.description: Personalization is available like hiding select objectives from the checklists, with more to come soon.

about.text: XIV ToDo is a project started in mid-2021 by {0}, a software developer from Canada. After realizing that there were no methods for quickly visualizing which of the numerous encounters and questlines that had been cleared by my characters, the idea had sparked. XIV ToDo is and remains free for everyone to enjoy. You can {1} with any question or feedback. Thank you so much for using and supporting this project!

discordSignIn.text: To use XIV ToDo, you must sign in with a Discord account. This is an official authentication integration provided by Discord and is very secure, since no confidential information is ever stored.

addingCharacters.text1: To add one of your characters, you first find its Lodestone URL. You can find it by logging into {0} and searching for your character profile. Your Lodestone URL will look similar to this example:
addingCharacters.text2: Once you have found your profile URL, you can input it in the {0} page and then click the {1} button. You can add as many as 8 characters, and switch between them at any time using the dropdown at the end of the main navigation bar.

freeTrialCharacters.text: Free trial characters are supported in XIV ToDo and can be added, but since the Lodestone privacy settings are unavailable on the free trial, the automatic completion tracker will not work for those characters.

enablingPublicAchievements.text1: If you add a character and their encounter and questline completions aren't getting registered, it's likely that the achievements are not set to visible publicly for that character. You can verify this by logging into {0}, and then accessing the {1} section. From there, make sure {2} is set to {3} and save the changes.
enablingPublicAchievements.text2: Once your achievements are public, you may need to re-add your character or refresh it from the {0} page on XIV ToDo for it to take effect.

customizingCharacterChecklists.text: Daily and weekly checklists can be customized by clicking on the {0} button near the top right of the {1} page. From there, you can add custom entries as well as hide entries that you don't want to see. To stop customizing, simply click the {2} button again.

encounterQuestlineCompletion.text1: Encounter and questlines are automatically marked as cleared once the relevant achievements have been obtained. Since encounters or questlines don't always map directly directly to in-game achievement, automated completion tracking is not always fully accurate. You can correct the tracking by manually marking the encounter or questline as cleared.
encounterQuestlineCompletion.text2: XIV ToDo takes in-game achievements data from the Lodestone, which can take a few hours to be up-to-date. Once a new in-game achievement is obtained, it may take up to 48 hours for the relevant encounter or questline to be marked as complete in XIV ToDo. You can also manually initiate a refresh of the data from the {0} page.
encounterQuestlineCompletion.textState: The following are the four possible statuses for each encounter and questline:
encounterQuestlineCompletion.stateClearedVerified: Your active character has cleared this encounter (verified).
encounterQuestlineCompletion.stateCleared: Your active character has cleared this encounter.
encounterQuestlineCompletion.stateUnknown: Your active character's current achievements cannot determine encounter clear.
encounterQuestlineCompletion.stateNotCleared: Your active character has not cleared this encounter yet.

otherQuestions.text: Contact me {0}, on {1} or on {2} and I will reply as soon as possible.

profile.playingSinceAlt: May not be accurate for legacy characters

checklist.scratchpadHelp: Once you add checklist items, they will appear here.

profileUrl.label: Profile URL
profileUrl.hint: The URL for your character profile. You can find it in {0}.

settings.myCharactersHelp: Once you add your characters, they will appear here.
settings.characterNotPublic: The achievements for this character are not set to public in Lodestone.

patchNumbers.label: Patch numbers
patchNumbers.option0: Show patch numbers for blurred out content
patchNumbers.option1: Show patch numbers for non-completed content
patchNumbers.hint: Preference in showing patch numbers for content.
